attachments.text: You enter a dimly lit room and Daedalus greets you. “Welcome to my Labyrinth. You must find your way to Room 160 and then back to me. If you can do this in a week I will give you 1000 points. Each room is locked. To get the key to a room, you’ll need to solve a puzzle, and plug the solution into the appropriate console. Ready to start? All you need to do is choose a room to go into.” You look around the room, and see four silver pads on the floor, each with one of the aforementioned consoles embedded into a wall nearby. You hesitantly advance towards one...
How old will Arnold Schwarzenegger be when Skynet has to send him back to kill Sarah Conner?

attachments.title: Galaxy A: Room 10

attachments.text: Jan and Sven are the two greatest Jenga players in the world. They decide to play a game of Jenga following all the normal rules, but add these additional rules to make it more challenging: Both players must always pull from the lowest possible level on the tower. Neither player is allowed to pull middle pieces. After an hour of intense play, the game ends in a draw when there are no legal pulls left, but the tower is still standing. How many levels high is the tower?

attachments.text: Kyndra, Cassandra, and Jessica are playing Settlers of Cataan (see image: http://www.anotherdungeon.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/03/Screenshot-Catan-5.jpg) It’s the start of Jessica’s turn (White). She decides to bet Kyndra (Red) that fewer than two stone cards will be distributed this turn, and puts $100 on the line. Cassandra, being a master of predicting outcomes, then says “You should take the bet, but only put up a maximum of ______ if you want your pot odds to be good.”

Each room is locked. To get the key to a room, you’ll need to solve a puzzle, and plug the solution into the appropriate console. Ready to start? All you need to do is choose a room to go into.” You look around the room, and see four silver pads on the floor, each with one of the aforementioned consoles embedded into a wall nearby. You hesitantly advance towards one...
attachments.title: Galaxy C: Room 28
Solve to unlock Galaxy B: Room 20
attachments.text: How old will Arnold Schwarzenegger be when Skynet has to send him back to kill Sarah Conner?
Black Pawn @ F42.  Black Knight @ D42. Black Rook @ A42. Black Bishop @ G42. Black Queen @ C3. Black King @ B3. Where can the White Queen @ A1 go safely?
